data.title: Revolver/Tony Petersen Film/HeimatTBWA take out Film Craft Grand Prix for Hornbach ‘The Square Meter’ ~ directed by Australia’s Steve Rogers
data.meta_description: Revolver / Tony Petersen Film / HeimatTBWA Berlin have taken out the coveted Film Craft Grand Prix for Hornbach 'The Square Meter' ~ directed by Australia's Steve Rogers.
data.text:
Revolver / Tony Petersen Film / HeimatTBWA Berlin have taken out the coveted Cannes Film Craft Lions Grand Prix for Hornbach ‘The Square Meter’ ~ directed by Australia’s Steve Rogers.

The film was also awarded two Gold Lions and one Silver Lion.

‘The Square Meter’ takes viewers on a journey through a series of square meter rooms, showing the boundless opportunity to be found even in the smallest of spaces.

Revolver was also awarded a Silver Lion in the Film Craft Lions category with The Monkeys for Sydney Opera House ‘Play It Safe’.
